definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical features and treatment of traumatic cerebral intraventricular hemorrhage(TIVH).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討外傷性腦室出血的臨牀特點和治療方法。

sentences.english: CNS infections may be associated with brain atrophy, with resultant microcephaly and ventriculomegaly.
sentences.chinese: 有關，伴有小頭畸形和腦室擴大的後果。

sentences.english: There are some comput rooms on the second floor.
sentences.chinese: 這兒有許多電腦室在三樓。

sentences.english: The patient underwent external decompression and external ventricular drainage.
sentences.chinese: 患者接受了外部減壓和腦室外引流。

sentences.english: Julie finds Ted working in the computer lab.
sentences.chinese: 朱莉發現特德在電腦室裏工作。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the diagnosis and treatment of microneurosurgery for meningiomas of the lateral ventricle.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討側腦室腦膜瘤的診斷及其顯微外科手術治療。

sentences.english: This afternoon I went to the computer room, the teacher also in, I found a seat.
sentences.chinese: 我下午去了電腦室，老師也在，我找了一個座位坐下。

sentences.english: The robot and I went into the computer room but Hee -Haw stayed outside.
sentences.chinese: 機器人和我進了電腦室，但“嘻嗬”留在外面。

sentences.english: Infectious causes of hydrocephalus may also result in narrowing of the mesencephalic aqueduct;
sentences.chinese: 造成吸收不良的原因可能是腦室感染引起。

sentences.english: Data centers have their roots in the huge computer rooms of the early ages of the computing industry.
sentences.chinese: 數據中心的根源在於巨大的電腦室早期年齡計算行業。

sentences.english: Objective To study the new treatment for hypertensive intraventricular hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究高血壓性腦室出血的新療法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the morphological characteristics and distribution of the cells in the subventricular zone(SVZ).
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察側腦室腦室下層細胞的形態及分佈。

sentences.english: Objective To study the morphological characteristics and distribution of the cells in the subventricular zone(SVZ).
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察側腦室腦室下層細胞的形態及分佈。

sentences.english: Part of multi-angle cells labeled at the bottom of the epithalamic tetra-brain ventricle.
sentences.chinese: 下丘腦的四腦室底部標記到部分多角細胞。

sentences.english: To explore the clinical outcome of microsurgery in the treatment of meningioma at the trigone of lateral ventricles.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討顯微手術治療側腦室三角區腦膜瘤的療效。

sentences.english: Ventriculography is of great value in locating the tumor.
sentences.chinese: 腦室造影對腫瘤定位有很大價值。
